business.headline: Temasek takes a bit of Haldiram's, buys 10% stake for $1 billion: ReportTemasek, which has already invested in Manipal Hospitals and fast-food giant Devyani International (operator of KFC and Pizza Hut in India), is now looking to cash in on the growing snacks market with its Haldiram's bet.

Air India rolls out premium economy fares starting at Rs 599 for a limited timeThese premium economy fares are above regular economy fares on domestic flights for a limited time. Prices vary based on routes and demand.

India's top 7 billionaires lose $34 billion amid stock market slumpMukesh Ambani, India's richest person, lost $3.13 billion this year, though he still remains India's richest man with a net worth of $87.5 billion.

Sensex falls over 400 points. 3 factors behind today's stock market slumpStock market today: At around 12:42 pm, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 439.77 points to 73,662.55 and the Nifty50 was trading 150.50 points lower at 22,347.40.

Why are some investors choosing fixed deposits over SIPs?Many stock market experts suggest that mid-cap and small-cap stocks are currently expensive, which has triggered a correction in the last six months.

Explained: Why IndusInd Bank share price is rising today after 27% crashIndusIndi Bank stock price: The stock surged nearly 14% from its intraday low, climbing to Rs 690 on the National Stock Exchange (NSE), breaking a five-day losing streak.At around 12 pm, shares of the company were up 3.18% to Rs 676.80 on the NSE.

5 billionaires at Trump's swearing-in see over $200 billion vanish in weeks   The start of Donald Trump's second term has been brutal for some of the world's richest billionaires, including those present at his swearing-in ceremony.

Jio and Airtel sign deals with Elon Musk's Starlink for satellite internet in IndiaJio and Airtel have signed separate agreements with Elon Musk's Starlink to bring satellite internet to India. The partnerships aim to provide high-speed broadband to remote and underserved areas. Starlink's service rollout depends on government approval. The deals could improve connectivity for education, healthcare, and businesses in regions lacking fibre-optic infrastructure. Starlink uses a constellation of 6,900 satellites for global broadband coverage.

Reliance shares gain after Jio's deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX for StarlinkRIL shares were up over 1% in early trade but gave up some gains due to market volatility. Around 10 am, the stock was trading 0.35% higher at Rs 1,251.50.
Infosys, TCS, Wipro: Why are major IT stocks falling today?At around 9:50 am, Infosys shares were down 3.5% and Wipro fell over 3.35%. HCLTech was down over 2.4% and TCS tumbled nearly 2%.

Sensex, Nifty swing between gains and losses in volatile session; IT stocks downThe S&P BSE Sensex, which was up nearly 300 points in early trade, fell 91.43 points to trade at 74,010.37 around 9:30 am. The Nifty50 also fell 40.60 points to trade at 22,457.30.

After Airtel, Jio signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink to IndiaThe partnership aims to expand broadband access across India, especially in remote areas. Jio, which handles more mobile data than any other operator, will use Starlink's satellite network to strengthen its internet services.

entertainment.headline: Kim, Khloe Kardashian search for their missing diamond at Ambani wedding. WatchIn the latest promo of The Kardashian Season 6, Kardashian sisters, Kim and Khloe, are seen panicking over their missing diamond as they attend the grand Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant wedding in Mumbai.

TV actor Aditi Sharma's rumoured boyfriend breaks silence amid infidelity allegationApollena actor Aditi Sharma's co-star Samarthya Gupta has denied rumours of an affair with her, calling the allegations baseless and harmful. Aditi's husband had alleged infidelity.

Kim Sae-ron's unpublished statement emerges after dating rumours with Kim Soo-hyunAlmost a month after South Korean actor Kim Sae-ron's death, her aunt has alleged K-drama star Kim Soo-hyun was in a relationship with Sae-ron, and that they began dating when she was only a minor.

Did Ekta Kapoor just take a jibe at Ram Kapoor in a video about Ozempic?Filmmaker Ekta Kapoor on Tuesday shared a video on Instagram in which she was seen talking about her weight gain and if she should follow artificial methods to lose some weight. There was also a Ram Kapoor connection.

Ibrahim Ali Khan re-posts Nadaaniyan's poor ratings, puzzled fans reactIbrahim Ali Khan reposted his film, Nadaaniyan's low ratings. Fans were puzzled by the actor's move in highlighting the film's poor performance.

Singer Ne-Yo introduces his four girlfriends from his polyamorous relationship In a candid revelation, American singer and songwriter Ne-Yo introduced his four girlfriends, embracing a polyamorous lifestyle. The musician shared insights into his unique relationship dynamic online, calling it his 'pyramid'.

Tapu-Sonu wedding in Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah…? Fans say 'must be Bhide's dream'A promo of Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah shows Tapu marrying Sonu, leaving fans in shock. Many speculate it's a dream sequence, as Bhide disapproves of Tapu. The sitcom, India's longest-running, first aired in 2008.

Exclusive: Louis Tomlinson on India debut, love for Indian food, and solo career Louis Tomlinson, former One Direction member, embarked on his first solo performance in India at Lollapalooza 2025. He expressed excitement and a fondness for Indian culture, particularly its cuisine, during an exclusive interview.

Telugu actor-politician Posani Krishna Murali granted bail in all casesActor and YSRCP member Posani Krishna Murali has been granted bail in all cases. The YSRCP accused Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu-led government of filing 17 cases against him as part of a political vendetta.

SRK, Aishwarya Rai top contenders to replace Amitabh Bachchan on KBC: StudyAccording to a recent study conducted among fans, actors Shah Rukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai are the top picks to replace megastar Amitabh Bachchan on his game show Kaun Banega Crorepati.

TV star Disha Vakani was told not to scream during labour: Gayatri Mantra helpedDisha Vakani, famed for her role as Dayaben in TMKOC, opened up about her use of the Gayatri Mantra during the birth of her daughter, Stuti.

Louis Tomlinson on first India visit, solo career, Lollapalooza, love for Indian food | Exclusive Former One Direction member Louis Tomlinson finally arrives in India! In this exclusive chat with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, he talks about his long-awaited visit, his excitement for Lollapalooza, and his deep love for Indian food (yes, he tried butter chicken!).

general news.headline: Baloch insurgents release video, show how they blew up track, hijacked trainPak train hijack: The video shows the Jaffar Express, which was carrying over 400 passengers, passing through Sibi city when a bomb blast on the tracks forces it to halt.

BJP set to sweep Haryana civic polls, breaches Congress's Rohtak strongholdHaryana Municipal Corporation Election Results 2025: The BJP's mayoral candidates are leading in nine of the 10 municipal corporations, including in Rohtak - the bastion of Congress stalwart Bhupinder Hooda.

Andhra's own 'Sheeshmahal': Jagan Mohan Reddy's Rushikonda Palace under lensJagan Mohan Reddy's grand mansion on Rushikonda Hill in Visakhapatnam is at the centre of a political storm. Chandrababu Naidu-led Andhra Pradesh government is in a dilemma to utilise the Rs 500 crore private palace built by the former Chief Minister.

Why is Yogi Adityanath trending in Nepal?A pro-monarchist rally was organised in Kathmandu to welcome Nepal's former king Gyanendra Shah on March 10. And smack dab in the middle of it? Massive images of Adityanath.

How Jinnah's betrayal sparked Baloch freedom movementBalochistan has seen periods of active rebellion for independence from Pakistan. It was the betrayal and merger of Kalat, a princely state in what is now Balochistan, into Pakistan by Muhammad Ali Jinnah that is one of the causes of the fierce battle for independence by the Baloch people.

Gold on body, Ranya Rao declared no goods at airport. Then metal detector went offIndia Today accessed the DRI's arrest memo against Ranya Rao who was arrested for smuggling gold from Dubai. The memo reveals details of arrest, confiscation of smuggled goods and Ranya's voluntary statements.

Over 150 passengers rescued from hijacked Pakistan train, 27 insurgents killed Live UpdatesThe Baloch Liberation Army, a separatist insurgent group, has claimed responsibility for hijacking the Jaffar Express. The group claims to hold about 200 hostages, but authorities have yet to confirm this figure.

India's top 7 billionaires lose $34 billion amid stock market slumpMukesh Ambani, India's richest person, lost $3.13 billion this year, though he still remains India's richest man with a net worth of $87.5 billion.

Watch: Rohit Sharma, Team India help resolve Ranbir-Aamir feud in new adRohit Sharma, Bumrah, Pant, and Hardik Pandya teamed up with Bollywood icons Aamir Khan and Ranbir Kapoor in a hilarious Dream11 ad ahead of the highly anticipated IPL 2025 season.

'Come to bed' request, China link: Ex-Meta employee's explosive claims in memoirIn her tell-all book, former Meta executive Sarah Wynn Williams speaks at length on the conduct of CEO Mark Zuckerberg and former COO Sheryl Sandberg.

150% tariff on US alcohol: White House criticises India again amid trade disputeThe White House Press Secretary's remarks came less than a month before US President Donald Trump's looming April 2 deadline to impose reciprocal tariffs on India. As per reports, the US has asked India to remove tariffs on nearly all goods except agricultural products.
Video: Chaos in Noida market as SUV rams multiple vehicles, then fleesThe police have launched a manhunt for the driver who fled the spot after the incident in Noida's Sector 16 car market.

Bitten by a dog? Rabies vaccine is not enough, you need more to stay safeIn the event of a dog bite, a person needs more than just the rabies vaccine. Experts highlight the importance of immunoglobulin despite taking a the ARV shot.
Why NEP 2020 has turned a language battle in Tamil NaduThe DMK government has slammed the three-language formula of the National Education Policy as a ploy to impose Hindi on the state

Russia launches 3 missiles, 133 drones in overnight attack: Ukraine armyThe Ukrainian military said the air force shot down 98 drones, while another 20 drones did not reach their targets, likely due to electronic warfare countermeasures.

Trump keeps his promise, buys Tesla, models for fleet outside White HouseAt the press conference on Tuesday, five vehicles were on display at the White Hoouse's South Law, with Donald Trump selecting a red Model S sedan to show his support to Elon Musk as he faces backlash over his efforts to downsize the federal government.

Why Meghalaya's Byrnihat has the most polluted air in the worldUnregulated industrial standards and vehicle emissions are the major drivers of the city's pollution. Joint action by the governments and citizens may help in combating the crisis.

Telugu veteran named in complaint 22 years after actor Soundarya's plane crashA fresh complaint has been filed against actor Mohan Babu, 22 years after the plane crash that took the life of popular South Indian actor Soundarya. She played Radha in Amitabh Bachchan's Sooryavansham.

After Airtel, Jio signs deal with Elon Musk's SpaceX to bring Starlink to IndiaThe partnership aims to expand broadband access across India, especially in remote areas. Jio, which handles more mobile data than any other operator, will use Starlink's satellite network to strengthen its internet services.

Over 500 Indians, lured into illegal jobs in Myanmar and Thailand, rescuedMore than 500 Indian nationals, who became victims of fake job offers in Myanmar and Thailand and subsequently got involved in cybercrimes, have been repatriated, the External Affairs Ministry said in a statement.

Karan Johar adds hilarious spin to 'insider vs outsider' debate: What a privilege Karan Johar gave a hilarious twist to the insider and outside debate with a picture on social media. The filmmaker said that he is very 'happy to be entitled' to his own thoughts.

Insurgents checked IDs, shot soldiers: Survivors recount Pak train hijackPassengers who were aboard the Jaffar Express that was hijacked in Pakistan, recounted the horror that unfolded inside the train, including intense screaming, firing and a blast as insurgents took control of the carriage.

Must learn to read, write Tamil for state government jobs: Madras High CourtThe Madurai Bench of the Madras High Court ruled that Tamil Nadu government job aspirants must read and write Tamil. The ruling came while the court dismissed a Tamil Nadu Electricity Board  employee's petition against being terminated for failing to clear the mandatory Tamil language exam.

Bihar: Mayor's 2-hour Holi break call stirs row, BJP slams 'terrorist mindset'Darbhanga mayor Anjum Ara proposed that Holi festivities be halted temporarily between 12.30 pm to 2 pm. As her remark invited criticism, she expressed regret.

Nora Fatehi trolls Kartik Aaryan: Is there anyone in industry you haven't dated?At IIFA 2025, Nora Fatehi teased Kartik Aaryan about dating co-actors, leaving the audience in splits. Meanwhile, Kartik's mom picked 'doctor' as her ideal bahu, sparking rumours about him dating actor Sreeleela.

Kim, Khloe Kardashian search for their missing diamond at Ambani wedding. WatchIn the latest promo of The Kardashian Season 6, Kardashian sisters, Kim and Khloe, are seen panicking over their missing diamond as they attend the grand Anant Ambani-Radhika Merchant wedding in Mumbai.

Mufasa The Lion King OTT release: When and where to watch the latest Disney filmMufasa The Lion King, directed by Barry Jenkins, will stream on JioHotstar from March 26. The film is all about Mufasa's journey from cub to king.

Cricketer David Warner to join promotions of Telugu debut film, RobinhoodThe team of Robinhood, starring Nithiin and Sreeleela, has officially confirmed David Warner's cameo as the film gears up for release on March 28. Director Venky Kudumula calls it his best work, and Nithiin hopes it will be a milestone in his career.

sports.headline: Another back injury in same spot could end Jasprit Bumrah's career: Shane BondShane Bond has claimed that another back injury in the same spot could prove to be a career-ender for Jasprit Bumrah. The Indian pacer missed the Champions Trophy 2025 due to a back injury.

Rohit Sharma rises to No. 3 in ODI rankings after Champions Trophy final heroics India captain Rohit Sharma was rewarded for his match-winning 76 against New Zealand in the Champions Trophy final. Rohit rose to No. 3 while Virat Kohli slipped to No. 5 in the latest ICC ODI Rankings, updated on March 12.

Shreyas Iyer 'running out of words' to describe India's Champions Trophy winShreyas Iyer claimed that he is 'running out of words' to describe India's Champions Trophy. Shreyas scored a vital 48 in the final of the tournament against New Zealand on Sunday, March 9.

Watch: Rohit Sharma, Team India help resolve Ranbir-Aamir feud in new adRohit Sharma, Bumrah, Pant, and Hardik Pandya teamed up with Bollywood icons Aamir Khan and Ranbir Kapoor in a hilarious Dream11 ad ahead of the highly anticipated IPL 2025 season.

Ireland cancel multi-format series against Afghanistan due to financial crunchCricket Ireland announced on Tuesday, March 11, that they have decided to cancel the multi-format series against Afghanistan due to financial constraints. Ireland was supposed to face Afghanistan in August.

PSG showed great personality, character in Liverpool shootout win: Luis EnriqueLuis Enrique was proud of his PSG side after their thrilling shootout win against Liverpool on Tuesday, March 11. PSG entered the quarterfinals of the Champions League with the win.

Real Madrid vs Atletico Madrid: All you need to know about big UCL clashReal Madrid look to seal their Champions League quarter-final spot as they face Atletico Madrid in a tense second-leg clash at the Metropolitano, with Jude Bellingham returning to bolster Carlo Ancelotti's attacking options.

Rohit Sharma must have goal in mind to play in 2027 ODI World Cup: Ricky PontingRicky Ponting feels that Rohit Sharma has the goal of playing the ODI World Cup 2027 in his mind as the Indian captain decided to prolong his career after the Champions Trophy 2027 final win.

Pakistan batting coach makes U-turn after pulling out of New Zealand tourPakistan batting coach Mohammad Yousuf, who had earlier pulled out of the New Zealand tour citing his daughter's health, has made a U-turn. Yousuf has informed that he would be travelling with the team.

India heroes gain big on social media during Champions TrophyThe Indian cricket team stars gained a huge number of followers on social media platforms during the Champions Trophy matches. Virat Kohli and Hardik Pandya were the leaders when it came to gaining followers.

Anand Mahindra backs India skater Tara Prasad for 2026 OlympicsAnand Mahindra praised skater Tara Prasad's success and decision to represent India, highlighting her resilience and determination after overcoming injuries to secure national titles and eye a spot at the 2026 Winter Olympics.

Pakistan batting coach makes U-turn after pulling out of New Zealand tourPakistan batting coach Mohammad Yousuf, who had earlier pulled out of the New Zealand tour citing his daughter's health, has made a U-turn. Yousuf has informed that he would be travelling with the team.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
